Faults.message:
We're sorry about the power cut in the area. The power cut is affecting 73 properties in the area shown on the map. We are working with our engineers to fix the problem as quickly as possible, and will keep you updated here on Power Track.

Engineers are on the way and will arrive in the area at 14:00 03/11/2025. When they get there, they'll work hard to fix the problem as quickly as possible. We'll keep you updated with any new information. At this stage, we're aiming to have your power back on by 21:00 03/11/2025.

We have had reports of an overhead power line coming down. When this happens, the power will automatically turn off to keep everyone safe. Our engineers know exactly where the problem is and are working hard to make the situation safe, repair the wire and get your power back on. These types of faults often require extensive work and specialist teams which is why the restoration time seems so far away. If we can restore power sooner, we promise we will do so.

If you need more information, please send us a message on Whatsapp or call us on 105 and quote reference 'RZ0542'
Faults.name: RG9 Area

Faults.message:
We're sorry about the power cut in the area. The power cut is affecting 4 properties in the area shown on the map. We are working with our engineers to fix the problem as quickly as possible, and will keep you updated here on Power Track.

Engineers are on the way and will arrive in the area at 16:15 03/11/2025. When they get there, they'll work hard to fix the problem as quickly as possible. We'll keep you updated with any new information. At this stage, we're aiming to have your power back on by 21:00 03/11/2025.

We have had reports of damage to our network. When this happens, the power will automatically turn off to keep everyone safe. Our engineers know exactly where the problem is and are working hard to make the situation safe, repair the wire and get your power back on. These types of faults often require extensive work and specialist teams, such as tree cutters, which is why the restoration time seems so far away. If we can restore power sooner, we promise we will do so.

If you need more information, please send us a message on Whatsapp or call us on 105 and quote reference 'RZ0574'
Faults.name: SN4 Area

Faults.message:
We're sorry about the power cut in the area. The power cut is affecting 2 properties in the area shown on the map. We are working with our engineers to fix the problem as quickly as possible, and will keep you updated here on Power Track.

Engineers are on the way and will arrive in the area at 17:40 03/11/2025. When they get there, they'll work hard to fix the problem as quickly as possible. We'll keep you updated with any new information. At this stage, we're aiming to have your power back on by 18:40 03/11/2025.

The cause of this power cut is a fault on our underground network. This is the most common type of fault we see, and our teams are very experienced in dealing with these issues. In most cases, our engineers are able to get your power back on by simply replacing a fuse at the local substation, however, if the fault is severe, this may take us longer to fix. If this does happen, we will let you know.

If you need more information, please send us a message on Whatsapp or call us on 105 and quote reference 'RZ0707'

We're finding the closest engineer available. They'll be making their way to the area as soon as possible. When they're on their way, we'll let you know what time they'll be arriving. At this stage, we're aiming to have your power back on by.

This fault is part of a planned power cut which is taking us longer than expected to restore due to a secondary fault we've located. Our teams are still on site and working as hard as they can to get the power back on.

If you need more information, please send us a message on Whatsapp or call us on 105 and quote reference 'RZ0726'

Faults.message: Planned power cut:Â There is a Planned Power Cut in the area today so we can carry out essential work. Our engineers will complete this work as quickly as possible, and well keep you updated here on Power Track. All affected customers received a letter and a text reminder about this. If you have a power cut but didn't get a letter, please call us on105 or send us a message on Facebook or Twitter@ssencommunity)with reference '245491'.
